roleset.name: extend too far
roleset.note: OVEREXTEND-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from overextend.01-v)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: I 'm going to tell the clerk that I will pay the increase AFTER the recall effort is successful , so I 'm sure the money will go to help my poor , overextended community survive , not to line some politician 's pockets .

example.name: chess
example.text: This game shows how I crushed a master who didn't take me very seriously, he overextended his position and totally neglected his king safety.
